name: Authentic
signal_source: App Store reviews emphasize need for platforms with 'pure, authentic expression' and 'fairness, transparency, and freedom' without shadowbans or hidden algorithms
description: Chronological creative platform that displays content without algorithmic manipulation or engagement optimization
target_user: Digital creators frustrated with algorithm-driven platforms that hide or manipulate their creative content visibility
pain_point_evidence: Users seek platforms that 'treat all users equally' and avoid 'fake profiles, bots, and accounts' with 'authenticity and safety concerns'
differentiation: Pure chronological display vs. algorithmic feeds, focuses on authentic reach over viral optimization
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced creation tools, analytics, and priority community support

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic sharing, premium for analytics and advanced tools
